meanings.definition: A television drama series that is typically melodramatic and characterized by a complex storyline.
meanings.sent1: My grandma loves watching telenovelas every evening.
meanings.sent2: Telenovelas often have unexpected plot twists to keep viewers engaged.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally walked in on my dad crying while watching telenovelas.
meanings.sent4: The telenovelas of life unfold in mysterious ways, just like on TV.
meanings.sent5: The telenovelas on screen are like real-life soap operas, full of drama and suspense.

meanings.definition: The genre of television drama series that originated in Latin America.
meanings.sent1: Telenovelas have become popular worldwide due to their captivating storylines.
meanings.sent2: The influence of telenovelas can be seen in many modern TV shows.
meanings.sent3: My friend jokingly said he's the main character in his own telenovelas.
meanings.sent4: In the world of entertainment, telenovelas are the colorful gems of Latin America.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant world of telenovelas transports viewers to exotic locations and intense emotions.
